name: @zenbu-ui/utils
description: Zenbu-UI - React UI components with easy customization, don't worry about CSS anymore.
author: Yudha Pratama <yudha.webdev@gmail.com>

scripts.tailwind: npx tailwindcss -c ../../tailwind.config.js -o src/tailwind.css --minify && cp src/tailwind.css tailwind.css
scripts.build:esm: cross-env BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .js,.jsx -d dist/esm --source-maps --copy-files
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --root-mode upward --extensions .js,.jsx -d dist/cjs --source-maps --copy-files
